tip nambar thri – daraganna bari nam mokada karanne enjimata daraganna bari tharamata hithaganna bari tharamata loku lod ekak aawama thamayi me slip sin eka wenna ganne.ape puthila oya loku giyar wala dala hemin lotanna gaththama hari kandakadi ekaparama wahanayak owartek karanna wegen yanna patan gaththama hari barak wahane athule hari thawath wahanayak adagena yanakota me kiwwa klach slip willa wenna puluwan bro.meka eka parama wenne na.tika tika tika tika thamayi wenne.oya slip wenna gaththama ethana athiwena gatima nisa rathwenna gannawa.eeta passe gewenna gewenna allan inna puluwan hakiyawa klach ekata aduwenawa.anthimata rathwena eka uparimeta awilla pichchenawa.anna ethakota thamayi oya flayiwil preshar pletuth kelawala pichchena gandakuth enne.

purappadu nopirawima, usaswim nisi lesa laba nodima, kanishta sewaka shreni 18 k kappadu kara thapal sahayaka namin thani shreniyak athikirima ha emagin watup kappadu kirima, departhamenthuwa wisin pawathwagena giya ithirikirime sewawa jathika ithiri kirime bankuwata pawarima, mudal pa්rathipadana kappadu kirima ha pudgalika eejansi thapal karyala pihituwimata awasaradima ee yatathe siduwiya.
wadi alewiyak sidu nowunath ihala mila nisa samagamata laba labe.
ithamath adu pahasukam yatathe pawathwagena giya ogi shabdagaraye itha usas patigatha kirim thakashanayak thana thibune shabda paripalakayage daskamini.
ese kirime hakiyawak ohuta nowuni.

ratawalwalata mehi wadagathkama penwa demin kanthawa, wyapara saha nithiya thama kapipenena karyabharaya awadharanaya karamin prathipaththimaya washayen sakachcha kirima sandaha katayuthu kirimata kapawi siti.

kawanthissa raja dawasa asu haradahasak dharmaskandhaya grantharudakara (mati puwaruwala kota) galoru hayaka baha chaithyaye thanpath kara athi bawin pothbanda wiharaya pasuwa pothubandana wiharaya bawata path wu bawa pura kathawala sandahan weyi.me wiharaya pilibandawa kiyawena janashrathi bohomayan athi athara sithul pawuwen wadama kala rahathan wahansela 500 k mehi wada wisu bawath, shri wikrama rajasinha raju me wiharasthanayata gamwara 500 k puja kara athi bawath dutugamunu rajuta sewaya kala pussadewa senewiya da gamwara puja kala bawath mema purakathawalin wisthara weyi.wellassa sanga parapure mulasthana wiharayak lesa salakena pothubandana sithawaka rajasinha raju diwayine wehera wihara sunuwisunu kala awasthawedi palamu wara kada binda dama athi athara 1818 udarata karallata anushasana aadhara upakara men ma karalikaruwanata rakawaranaya dima nisa ma ingirisin wisin gini thaba atha.monaragala bibila margaye paswana kilomitar kanuwa aasannayen dakunata hari kilomitarayaka pamana durin pihita athi me wiharaya adath pradeshawasin ge men ma siwu desin ena sancharakayinge wandum pindum walata thudu di aththe me aithihasika watinakam men ma ramaniya puda bimak da wana nisa ya.“kiri wehere koth karallamathin nangena daham ralla”gi padaya katharagama pudabima wetha apa sithin genayannata tharamma pramanawath weyi.
